articles.author: Adam Button
articles.title: USD/JPY stretches to fresh 34--year high - ForexLive
articles.description: The geopolitical bid in the yen has largely reversed. . The pair is at a fresh 34-year high, up a half-cent on the day as the market senses a peaceful resolution in the Iran-Israel skirmish.

articles.title: Inside the Controversy That's Divided the Carbon Offsets Market - Bloomberg
articles.description: Science Based Targets initiative, the world’s main verifier of corporate climate targets , faced pressure to relax their carbon offset standards.
